model

Class Clinic

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Clinic

  • public class Clinic
extends java.lang.Object
    This class models a veterinary clinic.
    Author:
    Mateo Valdes

      • Clinic

        public Clinic(java.lang.String n)
        Class constructor

        post: The room array is initialized
        post: The histories arraylist is initialized.
        post: The owners arraylist is initialized.
        post: The services arraylist is initialized.

        Parameters:
        n - The name of the clinic

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
        Sets up the rooms of the clinic to be empty and available.

      • addMedication

        public boolean addMedication(java.lang.String petName,
                             java.lang.String medName,
                             double dose,
                             double costPerDose,
                             double frequency)
        Asigns a new medication to a pet in a room.

        pre: rooms != null
        pre: rooms.length must be greater than or equal to 8
        post: One new medication is assigned to a pet in a room

        Parameters:
        petName - the name of the pet who will be assigned a new medicine
        medName - the name of the medication
        dose - the dose of the medication
        costPerDose - the cost of each dose of the medication
        frequency - The frequency (per day) of the medication
        Returns:
        true if the medication was added successfully, false if there is an error adding the medication.

      • addOwner

        public void addOwner(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String id,
                     java.lang.String address,
                     int phoneNumber)
        Adds a new owner object to the owners arraylist.

        pre: owners != null
        post: A new owner is added to the owners array list

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the owner
        id - The id of the owner
        address - The address of the owner
        phoneNumber - The phone number of the owner

      • addPet

        public void addPet(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   int age,
                   double weight,
                   double height)
        Adds a pet to the last owner on the arraylist of owners pre: owners != null
        post: A pet is added to the last owner in the arraylist of owners
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the pet
        type - The type of pet
        age - The age of the pet
        weight - The weight of the pet in kilograms
        height - The height of the pet in meters

        petName - The name of the pet
        day - The day of the month
        month - The month
        year - The year

        diagnosis - The pet's diagnosis
        Returns:

        public boolean isHospitalized(java.lang.String petName)
        Checks to see if the pet is currently hospitalized

        pre: rooms != null

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the pet who may be hospitalized
        Returns:
        true if the pet is currently hospitalized, false if the pet is not currently hospitalized

        pre: rooms != null

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the hospitalized pet
        day - The current day of the month
        month - The current month
        year - The current year
        Returns:

                          int day,
                          int month,
                          int year)

        pre: rooms != null
        pre: histories != null

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the hospitalized pet
        day - The current day of the month
        month - The current month
        year - The current year
        Returns:
        true if the pet was released successfully, false if it was not.

      • addService

        public java.lang.String addService(int type,
                                   int day,
                                   int month,
                                   int year,
                                   java.lang.String petName)
        Adds a new service to the

        pre: owners != null
        post: a new service is added to the clinic's list of services.

        Parameters:
        type - The type of service
        day - The day the service was performed
        month - The month the service was performed
        year - The year the service was performed
        petName - The name of the pet who received the service
        Returns:
        A string informing the user whether the service was added successfully or not

      • calculateServiceRevenue

        public double calculateServiceRevenue()
        Calculates the total revenue from all the performed services

        pre: services != null

        Returns:
        A double containing the clinic's total revenue from services

      • calculateAvgServiceRevenue

        public double calculateAvgServiceRevenue()
        Calculates the average service revenue by taking the total revenue from services and dividing it by the total number of services performed
        Returns:
        a double with the average service revenue
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException

      • calculateBMI

        public java.lang.String calculateBMI(java.lang.String petName)
        This method allows to calculate the body mass index for a given pet.

        pre: The pet was created before and its attributes height and weight are not null neither height must be zero.
        post: The BMI is calculated.

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the pet whose BMI is desired.
        Returns:
        A String containing the pet's body mass index. If the pet is not found, the user is notified

      • updateOwnerData

        public java.lang.String updateOwnerData(java.lang.String addr,
                                        int phoneNum,
                                        java.lang.String oName)
        Description This method allows to update the basic data of a veterinary client, these data include, address and phone number.

        pre: owners != null
        post: The address and /or phone number of the client is updated.

        Parameters:
        addr - The new address of the client. This param could be empty.
        phoneNum - The new phone number of the client. This param could be empty.
        oName - The name of the owner whose data will be updated
        Returns:
        A message informing the user if the pet owner's information was updated successfully

      • addNewMedication

        public java.lang.String addNewMedication(java.lang.String petName,
                                         java.lang.String medName,
                                         double dose,
                                         double cost,
                                         double frequency)
        Description This method allows to add new medicines that were prescription during the hospitalization at the patient stories.

        pre: owners != null
        post: New medicines were added to the patient clinic story.

        Parameters:
        petName - The pet's name. This param must not be null.
        name - The medicine name. This param must be not null.
        dose - The medicine dose, this param refers to the amount of medicine supplied to the pet each time according the frequence assigned.
        cost - The medicine cost by each dose. This param could be empty.
        frequency - The frequency of medicine application. This param could be empty.
        Returns:
        A message that indiques if medicine was added to the patient clinic story

      • addNewDiagnosis

        public java.lang.String addNewDiagnosis(java.lang.String petName,
                                        java.lang.String newDiagnosis)
        Adds a new possible diagnosis to a hospitalized pet

        post: The pet's diagnosis is updated

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the pet whose new possible diagnosis will be added
        newDiagnosis - The new diagnosis that will be added to the pet's record
        Returns:
        A String indicating whether it was possible to add the new diagnosis to the hospitalized pet's record

      • addNewSymptom

        public java.lang.String addNewSymptom(java.lang.String petName,
                                      java.lang.String newSymptom)
        Adds a new symptom to a hospitalized pet's list of symptoms

        post: The pet's symptom is updated

        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the pet whose new symptom will be added
        newDiagnosis - The new symptom that will be added to the pet's record
        Returns:
        A String indicating whether it was possible to add the new symptom to the hospitalized pet's record

      • calculateWeekServiceRevenue

        public double calculateWeekServiceRevenue(int day,
                                          int month,
                                          int year)
        Calculates the average service revenue in a given week

        pre: services != null

        Parameters:
        day - The day of the month when the week starts
        month - The month when the week starts
        year - The year when the week starts
        Returns:
        The average revenue in the given week

      • reportServicesWithinRange

        public java.lang.String reportServicesWithinRange(int minD,
                                                  int minM,
                                                  int minY,
                                                  int maxD,
                                                  int maxM,
                                                  int maxY)
        Determines if a service has been performed within the given timeframe and gives a full report of the service.
        Parameters:
        minD - Day of the month when the time frame begins
        minM - Month when the time frame begins
        minY - Year when the time frame begins
        maxD - Day of the month when the time frame ends
        maxM - Month when the time frame ends
        maxY - Year when the time frame ends
        Returns:
        A full report of all the services performed by the clinic within that time frame

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the full name of the clinic
        Returns:
